subroutine bubble_sort(a)
  integer, intent(in out) :: a(:)
  integer :: i, j, tmp, n
  n = size(a)
  do i = 1, n-1
     do j = 1, n-i
        if (a(j) > a(j+1)) then
           tmp = a(j)
           a(j) = a(j+1)
           a(j+1) = tmp
        end if
     end do
  end do
end subroutine bubble_sort
